Uses of Package
com.crawljax.core

  • Packages that use com.crawljax.core 
    Package Description
    com.crawljax.browser
    This is the core package for the browsers.
    com.crawljax.core
    This is the core package for Crawljax.
    com.crawljax.core.configuration
    This is the core package for configuration.
    com.crawljax.core.plugin
    This plugin package for Crawljax.
    com.crawljax.core.state
    This is the core package for the state machine.
    com.crawljax.forms
    Forms package.
    com.crawljax.plugins.savecrawlsession
    Package of the SaveCrawlSession plugin.
  • Classes in com.crawljax.core used by com.crawljax.browser 
    Class and Description
    CrawljaxException 
    CrawlQueueManager
    This interface defines operations that can be used to add work to the queue and remove work from the crawlqueue.
